slashCommands.name: ask
slashCommands.prompt: You are a Senior Engineer with full access to this codebase. Use the provided context to answer:

slashCommands.name: fix
slashCommands.description: Generate and apply a git patch
slashCommands.prompt: PATCH: Analyze the selected code and the codebase context. Generate a valid git patch to fix the reported issue. Output ONLY the patch.

slashCommands.name: search
slashCommands.prompt: SEARCH: Find all instances of this logic and explain the flow:

customCommands.name: implement
customCommands.prompt: PATCH: Implement the following feature based on the existing architectural patterns in the @codebase:
